Git will start tracking all changes in the current folder.
-git init

Create Own Clone of existing repository:
-git clone <url> <folder_name>
-git clone https://wkaxcess.visualstudio.com/Fixed%20Assets%20Manager/_git/Git_Fixed%20Assets%20Manager Git_Fixed_Assets_Manager

switch from one branch to another:
-git checkout <branch name>

Push from branch to master branch:
-git push origin ravi_branch
//After that create pull request to merge into master after aproval from other member

get the status on the branch or workspace if anything need to add, commit or push:
-git status

commit data into local repo from workspace:
-git commit -m "comment here why/what committing"

Adding files into local workspace for committing
-git add <. or folder_name>
